scripts.coverage:
rm -rf coverage && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover test.js -- --backend --reporter t
ap && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul report --root coverage lcov cobertura
scripts.coverage-backend:
rm -rf coverage && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover test.js -- --backend && .
/node_modules/.bin/istanbul report --root coverage lcov
scripts.coverage-frontend:
rm -rf coverage && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover test.js -- --frontend &&
 ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul report --root coverage lcov
